com.google.template.soy.jbcsrc.runtime

Class Runtime

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.template.soy.jbcsrc.runtime.Runtime

  • public final class Runtime
extends Object
    Runtime utilities uniquely for the jbcsrc backend.

      • resolveSoyValueProvider

        public static SoyValue resolveSoyValueProvider(SoyValueProvider provider)
        Helper function to translate NullData -> null when resolving a SoyValueProvider that may have come from SoyValueProvider.

      • getFieldProvider

        public static SoyValueProvider getFieldProvider(SoyRecord record,
                                                String field)
        Helper function to make SoyRecord.getFieldProvider a non-nullable function by returning NULL_PROVIDER for missing fields.

      • callSoyFunction

        public static SoyValue callSoyFunction(SoyJavaFunction function,
                                       List<SoyValue> args)
        Helper function to translate null -> NullData when calling SoyJavaFunctions that may expect it.

        In the long run we should either fix ToFu (and all SoyJavaFunctions) to not use NullData or we should introduce custom SoyFunction implementations for have come from SoyValueProvider.

      • applyPrintDirective

        public static SoyValue applyPrintDirective(SoyJavaPrintDirective directive,
                                           SoyValue value,
                                           List<SoyValue> args)
        Helper function to translate null -> NullData when calling SoyJavaPrintDirectives that may expect it.

      • applyEscapers

        public static CompiledTemplate applyEscapers(CompiledTemplate delegate,
                                             List<SoyJavaPrintDirective> directives,
                                             @Nullable
                                             SanitizedContent.ContentKind kind)
        Wraps a given template with a collection of escapers to apply.
        Parameters:
        delegate - The delegate template to render
        directives - The set of directives to apply
        kind - The content kind of the delegate template (if any)
